name: Alien Contact Simulator
description:
A mysterious alien object has been detected entering the solar system and you have been put in charge of a mission to investigate. Use the tools at your disposal to determine the Alien's intentions and achieve the best outcome for humanity. The Alien's personality and objectives are randomly generated so each game should play differently than the previous one.

The game is complete as is but I would love to hear suggestions for how it could be improved and if there is any additional content people would like to see.
